CustomField.formula: IF(Apttus_Config2__LineItemId__r.Apttus_Config2__ProductId__r.ProductCode == 'ISAMFXP',"The 7360 ISAM FX Family can be delivered in different Flavours each supporting a different number of Line termination boards: FX-4 4 LT boards, FX-8 8 LT boards, FX-16 16 LT Boards, 2 FX-16 32 LT-Boards. The FX-16 Flavours are already pre-mounted in a rack. For the other flavours who still need to be mounted, please select the Rack if needed and the horizontal or vertical mounting kit.",IF(Apttus_Config2__LineItemId__r.Apttus_Config2__ProductId__r.ProductCode == '7705SARH',"The SAR-H Supports up to 2 line cards.",IF(Apttus_Config2__LineItemId__r.Apttus_Config2__ProductId__r.ProductCode == 'ISAMFXNAR',"The starter Kits are preconfigured with FANT-F Network Termination boards, Each already preconfigured with one Uplink. Each NT board supports 1-4 Uplinks. In case of NT-redundancy The number of NTs and the number of uplinks need to be doubled (paired).Please select the Uplinks needed.Also the use of an NTIO is supported but optional each supporting upto 8 uplinks.Please select respective NTIO and uplinks if needed.",IF(Apttus_Config2__LineItemId__r.Apttus_Config2__ProductId__r.ProductCode == 'POLNAR',"Line Termination boards quantity is automatically calculated from the required PON and XGS-PON ports. It is derived from ONTs quantitiy divided by the split ratio",IF(Apttus_Config2__LineItemId__r.Apttus_Config2__ProductId__r.ProductCode=='7363ISAMMX6',"The 7363 ISAM MX-6 supports one SFP uplink and supports vectoring across 3 LT cards. An NT I/O card is needed if more SFP uplinks or vectoring across more than 3 LT cards is required.", IF(Apttus_Config2__LineItemId__r.Apttus_Config2__ProductId__r.ProductCode == '7705SAR8',"The SAR-8 can support up to 6 MDA modules. Please select from the options below. This list has been filtered based on the selections you made in the Shelf tab.",IF(Apttus_Config2__LineItemId__r.Apttus_Config2__ProductId__r.ProductCode == '5520AMS',"Please double check that the number of ports introduced in the AMS matches with the number of ports dimensioned in the Product configurators. This number is the sum up of the number of GPON ONTs + the number of p2p cards multiplied by the card modularity.",IF(Apttus_Config2__LineItemId__r.Apttus_Config2__ProductId__r.ProductCode == '7362DF16GW',"7362DF 16GW includes two Mandatory licences: IPv6 Security SW package and Subscriber Authentication SW Package. Additional Licenses need to selected for the cases where Video Services are required.",IF(Apttus_Config2__LineItemId__r.Apttus_Config2__ProductId__r.ProductCode == '7368ONT',"You need to select the ONTs required in your Network. If the list doesn't get updated, Please click on Validate button.",IF(Apttus_Config2__LineItemId__r.Apttus_Config2__ProductId__r.ProductCode == "MPW",'Please provide the number of GC deployments required.',IF(Apttus_Config2__LineItemId__r.Apttus_Config2__ProductId__r.ProductCode == 'POL',"According to the inputs provided in previous tab the number of XGSPON ports needed is "+ TEXT( C_VFX2_P1_1__c )+" . Please ensure that the sum up of XGS-PON XFPs dimensioned in this tab corresponds with this value",IF(Apttus_Config2__LineItemId__r.Apttus_Config2__ProductId__r.ProductCode == '7750SRe',"Please select the optics and pluggables required. This list has been filtered based on the selections you made in the Shelf and line cards tabs."+BR()+"Please wait until to have all the Optics tab refreshed.",IF(Apttus_Config2__LineItemId__r.Apttus_Config2__ProductId__r.ProductCode == 'SPS','You have decided to override default'+ BR() + 'Aerospike, Please uncheck the checkbox'+ BR() + 'above to see defaults again',"The SR-a8 can support 2 IOM-a. With one IOM-a only 4 slots can be populated, with two IOM-a all 8 slots can be populated with line cards.")))))))))))))
CustomField.label: Guidance
